summary: User requests a dedicated method to check if a workflow is running by ID without having to catch exceptions. Currently, the only way is to attempt getting a running workflow stub and catching WorkflowException if it fails.
userImpact: Users must use exception-based error handling to determine workflow status instead of having a clean API method.
workaround: Use newUntypedRunningWorkflowStub() and catch WorkflowException to determine if workflow is running
resolutionDetails: Resolved by implementing a dedicated method to check workflow running status
keyQuote: At the moment the only possible way is to try to get a running workflow and catch an exception
